name: Sleep Reset
headline: Sleep Reset is a clinically proven CBT-i program for better sleep
description:
Our mission is to improve quality of life for millions of people by providing easy, immediate access to the world’s best sleep care.

Sleep Reset is a digital, personalized sleep clinic, available in a convenient mobile app for iOS and Android. Our program was designed in partnership with leading sleep experts from top sleep clinics and universities. The program improves sleep and reduces sleep anxiety with the most effective methods from sleep clinics, including strategies based on Cognitive Behavioral Therapy for Insomnia (CBT-i) which are proven to be more effective than sleeping pills. Throughout our program, each member is paired with a dedicated sleep coach who personalizes their program. It’s a life-long, sustainable solution to sleep better in weeks, with no pills or melatonin needed – which means no grogginess, side effects, or dependency.

Sleep Reset has been covered in Forbes, TechCrunch, and INSIDER. The company was founded by Yunha Kim, a serial entrepreneur recognized by Forbes as 30 Under 30 and is backed by top Silicon Valley investors including YCombinator, Foundation Capital, New Enterprise Associates, Stanford University and 20+ founders/executives of leading companies.

## Why Sleep Reset isa No-Pills Program
Sleep Reset is a long-term solution that doesn’t rely on harmful sleeping pills.Sleep experts only recommend pills as temporary fixes, which can lead to dependency.Many sleep aids only sedate you, preventing you from reaching critical deep brain wave REM sleep – causing daytime grogginess, long-term health risks like Alzheimer’s or dementia, and potentially even increased mortality.That’s why both the American Academy of Sleep Medicine and the American College of Physicians recommend our program’s techniques over pills.
[Take our sleep quiz](https://www.thesleepreset.com/<https:/thesleepreset.com/quiz/improve-your-sleep?utm_source=OrganicWeb&utm_source=yc>)
## Our 30 Days Program
Find out why you’re not sleeping well and overcome sleep anxiety, so you can sleep deeply through the night without pills or grogginess.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e6c90d43582777cf0fc084/6483139db84ff974ab3fdae5_Frame%2013.svg)
##### In-depth sleep assessment
Designed by leading sleep experts to uncover the root causes of your sleep issues or sleep anxiety
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e6c90d43582777cf0fc084/6483140d3d5c25f54c9e6289_Frame%2013.svg)
##### Structured weekly action plan
Personalized to address your root causes, using clinically-proven cognitive restructuring and behavior change techniques
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e6c90d43582777cf0fc084/64831422f12000a18e9583df_Frame%2013.svg)
##### Access to a trained sleep coach
Dedicated sleep coach via daily text to provide accountability, support, and guidance
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e6c90d43582777cf0fc084/64831437fd31c7c8e00675ac_Frame%2013.svg)
##### A convenient mobile app
With a sleep science curriculum, sleep logging, progress tracking tools, and a library of meditations and mindfulness exercises

## Why Sleep ExpertsRecommend Sleep Reset
## Why Sleep ExpertsRecommend Sleep Reset
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e6c90d43582777cf0fc084/64832f713e84ed8b27349c8e_r1.svg)
### Effective
75% of Sleep Reset members improve their sleep with our Foundation Program, as proven by our peer-reviewed clinical data.Members gain an hour and a half more sleep each night, with 53% less time needed to fall asleep, and 41% less time awake in the night.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e6c90d43582777cf0fc084/64834bf520e7aee7b46c6cee_r2.svg)
### No pills
No harmful pills, melatonin or supplements – which means no grogginess, dependency, or long-term health risks.About half of members who take sleeping pills stop taking them by the end of the program.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e6c90d43582777cf0fc084/64834bf55313544d3e085e15_r3.svg)
### Science-backed
Designed with leading sleep experts from Stanford University, Yale University’s School of Medicine, and University of Arizona.Uses clinically-proven techniques recommended by the American Academy of Sleep Medicine as the gold standard insomnia treatment.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e6c90d43582777cf0fc084/64834bf5e5908196d91c115c_r4.svg)
### Personalized
An action plan personalized to your unique sleep situation, based on your personal sleep data and history.A personal dedicated sleep coach available to you daily via text, to customize your program and provide accountability and support.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e6c90d43582777cf0fc084/64834bf5b2d060516f6566f5_r5.svg)
### Available from home
Sleep Reset is done entirely from the comfort of home via our mobile app.No in-person appointments or fancy equipment required.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e6c90d43582777cf0fc084/64834bf500e69c2b3623a5cd_r6.svg)
### Results in two weeks
The techniques in our program are usually only available at in-person sleep clinics, which have 3-6 month waitlists and cost up to $5,000.With Sleep Reset, you can start your program today and start seeing improvements to your sleep, health, and wellbeing within just two weeks.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e6c90d43582777cf0fc084/64833ec37cc61c603f7c9ea7_Frame%201133.svg)
## Our Members
Over 1,000 reviews with a 4.8 star rating
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e6c90d43582777cf0fc084/64833ff50244efd7c85497bb_Text.svg)
I was in bed 9 hours to get 6 hrs, and it would take me 2 hrs to get going in the mornings from my cocktail of OTC sleep products (1 Benadryl, 5-10 mg of Melatonin)- that weren’t even working. It took 15 days for me to see a change and it got worse before it got better, but I’m really happy with where I am now. I’m down to 1/2 Benadryl only and am weaning off that. Even if I wake up at night (by my husband, bathroom, etc.) I go right back to sleep. I have gained 3-5 hrs in my day and can participate in some early group workouts.
Jo M
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e6c90d43582777cf0fc084/6483402f3d5c25f54cd9b4bc_Frame%201133.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e6c90d43582777cf0fc084/64833ff50244efd7c85497bb_Text.svg)
I started having insomnia several years ago due to work-related stress. The stress resolved but by that time my body had become habituated to waking during the night for several hours. I’ve tried lots of different things, including exercise and melatonin, to help but realized I needed a structured program. You have a sleep coach assigned to you and can ask questions anytime and the coach will answer the next work day. If the coach doesn’t hear from you, he or she will check in every week. I liked the information presented, logging my sleep and having the coach for accountability. I’m happy to say that I feel like I have graduated and no longer need this program because it solved my sleep issue. Thank you so much to the makers of this program. It was life changing for me!
Mary L
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e6c90d43582777cf0fc084/6483402f3d5c25f54cd9b4bc_Frame%201133.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e6c90d43582777cf0fc084/64833ff50244efd7c85497bb_Text.svg)
I was at rock bottom and exhausted, sleeping 2 - 3 hours a night. I went to my doctor and they gave me sleeping pills. They helped a little, but I experienced side effects in the morning. I tried expensive patches and drugs from the internet. Nothing worked. Through a series of desperate “I’ll try anything,” I found this program. I now sleep six-plus hours a night on average. I understand why I wasn't sleeping and how to change my habits to get better sleep. The best part is no sleeping pills, patches, or drinks. I was very skeptical but desperate, so I tried it, and my life will forever be better.
Catherine Z
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e6c90d43582777cf0fc084/6483402f3d5c25f54cd9b4bc_Frame%201133.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e6c90d43582777cf0fc084/64833ff50244efd7c85497bb_Text.svg)
I have been struggling with sleep issues for over 20 years and this program has been a game changer! While my sleep is not perfect, I am sleeping longer and better without the long nocturnal waking periods I’ve had in the past. Among the many lessons I have benefited from are Mindfulness, Meditation, Self-Compassion, Patience, Deep Breathing, Body Scanning — the list goes on. Many of the techniques presented are familiar, but it was so very helpful to have the information and guidance presented in the lessons and then to practice. My coach was great - available each weekday, helpful, supportive, encouraging. I highly recommend this program. It is backed by sound scientific studies. I didn’t want to go the sleep study route, and this totally answered my needs and concerns.
Nathan O
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e6c90d43582777cf0fc084/6483402f3d5c25f54cd9b4bc_Frame%201133.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e6c90d43582777cf0fc084/64833ff50244efd7c85497bb_Text.svg)
This process works. I had been taking a variety of OTC sleep aids with varying degrees of success. I had read about Cognitive Behavioral Therapy for Insomnia and this program had quite good reviews from people who had completed the program. I’m in my 3rd week now and am sleeping through the night. I do realize that that phrase usually applies to 3 month old infants. Still, it’s true. My coach is available every day and offers helpful tips and advice. ## Why Sleep Reset isa No-Pills Program
Sleep Reset is a long-term solution that doesn’t rely on harmful sleeping pills.Sleep experts only recommend pills as temporary fixes, which can lead to dependency.Many sleep aids only sedate you, preventing you from reaching critical deep brain wave REM sleep – causing daytime grogginess, long-term health risks like Alzheimer’s or dementia, and potentially even increased mortality.That’s why both the American Academy of Sleep Medicine and the American College of Physicians recommend our program’s techniques over pills.

## Why Sleep ExpertsRecommend Sleep Reset
## Why Sleep ExpertsRecommend Sleep Reset
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e6c90d43582777cf0fc084/64832f713e84ed8b27349c8e_r1.svg)
### Effective
75% of Sleep Reset members improve their sleep with our Foundation Program, as proven by our peer-reviewed clinical data.Members gain an hour and a half more sleep each night, with 53% less time needed to fall asleep, and 41% less time awake in the night.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e6c90d43582777cf0fc084/64834bf520e7aee7b46c6cee_r2.svg)
### No pills
No harmful pills, melatonin or supplements – which means no grogginess, dependency, or long-term health risks.About half of members who take sleeping pills stop taking them by the end of the program.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e6c90d43582777cf0fc084/64834bf55313544d3e085e15_r3.svg)
### Science-backed
Designed with leading sleep experts from Stanford University, Yale University’s School of Medicine, and University of Arizona.Uses clinically-proven techniques recommended by the American Academy of Sleep Medicine as the gold standard insomnia treatment.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e6c90d43582777cf0fc084/64834bf5e5908196d91c115c_r4.svg)
### Personalized
An action plan personalized to your unique sleep situation, based on your personal sleep data and history.A personal dedicated sleep coach available to you daily via text, to customize your program and provide accountability and support.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61e6c90d43582777cf0fc084/64834bf5b2d060516f6566f5_r5.svg)
### Available from home
Sleep Reset is done entirely from the comfort of home via our mobile app.No in-person appointments or fancy equipment required.

generated_description:
Sleep Reset is a forward-thinking company committed to improving sleep quality through a clinically-proven program based on Cognitive Behavioral Therapy for Insomnia (CBT-i). Founded in 2023 by Yunha Kim—a noteworthy serial entrepreneur recognized in Forbes 30 Under 30—Sleep Reset is situated in the vibrant San Francisco Bay Area and operates with a dedicated team of eight.

**Mission & Vision:**
Sleep Reset's overarching aim is remarkable: to enhance the quality of life for millions by democratizing access to top-notch sleep care via a user-friendly mobile app for both iOS and Android. The aim is clear—provide effective sleep training without reliance on medication, ensuring users can achieve restful slumber without side effects or dependency.

**Program Highlights:**
The program pairs each member with a dedicated sleep coach who tailors strategies to individual needs. This blend of personalized support and scientifically-backed methods ensures that users experience sustainable improvements in their sleep in as little as two weeks. The app combines features like sleep assessments, progress tracking, a library of mindfulness resources, and more, all designed with insights from leading sleep experts across top institutions.

**Backed by Expertise:**
The program's strength lies in its foundation; it's built on research developed alongside experts from institutions like Stanford University and Yale. Its unique approach prioritizes proven techniques over temporary fixes like sleeping pills, garnering attention from platforms such as Forbes, TechCrunch, and INSIDER.

**Investor Confidence:**
Backed by a prestigious portfolio of investors including Y Combinator and notable Silicon Valley venture firms, Sleep Reset is positioned as a standout in the health-tech landscape, particularly in the burgeoning fields of mental health and sleep technology.

**User Success:**
Users have reported significant improvements, averaging an additional 1.5 hours of sleep per night and less time awake during the night. The program aims to empower individuals not just to catch up on sleep, but to understand and manage their sleep health better.

If you’re curious about how your sleep patterns stack up, Sleep Reset offers a welcoming invitation to start with a free assessment. With Sleep Reset, you’re stepping into a solution that could redefine your nightly routine—because better sleep means a better you. For more details, head to [Sleep Reset](https://www.thesleepreset.com/?utm_source=yc).
